columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: VENDOR_APPEAL_FLG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The APPEAL_FLAG category number for this row.  This determines the type of response represented by this row.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Correct Claim


Claim Needs Attention


Under Appeal


Successful Appeal


Denied Appeal


Pending Further Action


Partial Recovery

columns.name: VENDOR_RESPONSE_DT
columns.description: The date when this response was received.

columns.name: VENDOR_REIMB
columns.description: The reimbursement amount associated with the response.

columns.name: VENDOR_VARIANCE
columns.description: The variance amount associated with the response.
